DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , prospective , multicentre , phase IIa study , evaluate new therapeutic agent management patient suffer inoperable non resectable biliary carcinoma . The patient receive dose WST11 accord order inclusion . The first 3 patient receive 2.5 mg/kg . In absence toxicity , follow 9 patient receive dose 5 mg/kg . The patient receive anesthesia . WST11-mediated therapy consist combination single IV administration WST11 dose 2.5mg/kg 5mg/kg , use 753nm laser light fix power ( 150mW/cm ) light energy ( 200 J/cm ) deliver diffuse fiber . The fiber introduce transparent standard ERCP catheter position radioscopy front lesion .
